ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who are herded headlong into Hell, such people are in the worst position. They are the most
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who will be pushed faces forward into Hell will be in a worse position, farther away from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those who are going to be driven to Hell upon their faces, have taken an utterly wrong stand and their way is most erroneous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who will be driven headlong into hell will have a terrible dwelling; they have certainly gone astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who will be dragged on their faces towards hell – theirs is the worst destination and they are the most astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who will be gathered to Hell on their faces, such will be in an evil state, and most astray from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those who shall be gathered upon their faces to hell, they are in a worse plight and straying farther away from the path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those who shall be mustered to Gehenna upon their faces -- they shall be worse in place, and gone further astray from the way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who will be gathered on their faces unto hell: such are worse in plight and further from the right road.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who will be dragged headlong into Hell shall have an evil place to dwell in, for they have strayed far from the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They who shall be gathered prone on their faces unto Hell-- those shall be worst in respect of place and the most astray in respect of path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who will be mustered [fallen] on their faces toward hell, they are the worse situated and further astray from the [right] way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces,- they will be in an evil plight, and, as to Path, most astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who will be gathered to Hell (prone) on their faces, such will be in an evil state, and most astray from the (Straight) Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who will be gathered into Gehenna (Hell) upon their faces shall be in the worst in place, and have gone further astray from the Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who are herded into Hell on their faces—those are in a worse position, and further astray from the way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:34] They are, those who will be gathered on their faces, that is, [those who] will be driven [as cattle], toward Hell: they will be in the worst place, namely, Hell, and furthest astray from the way, [they will be] on a path of error worse than that of others; and this [path] is their disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those who will be gathered) will be dragged (on their faces unto hell) i.e. Abu Jahl and his host: (such are worse in plight) they have a worse abode in the Hereafter and worse works in this worldly life (and further from the right road) from the Truth and guidance.
